titleStmt.title: Ioannis Longlondi Dei gratia Lincolnien[sis] Episcopi, tres conciones reuerendissimo Domino. do. vvaramo Cantuariensi Archiepiscopo totius Angliæ primati merito nuncupatæ.
titleStmt.author: Longland, John, 1473-1547.
Caius, Thomas, d. 1572, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
